alert.note: Alert for Cass; White (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 29 at 1:35AM EDT until July 29 at 2:15AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... White County in northwestern Indiana... Northwestern Cass County in north central Indiana... * Until 215 AM EDT. * At 135 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Hanging Grove to Otterbein, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Logansport, Monticello, Brookston, Wolcott, Reynolds, Chalmers, Burnettsville, Clymers, Badger Grove, Smithson, Golden Hill, Indiana Beach, Norway, Idaville, Sitka, Cedar Point, and Lake Cicott. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
